rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0001
rows.name: Do you mean the myths were true after all?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0002
rows.name: Why did the Vita[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0003
rows.name:
The vessel of the Great One... [lose] to mere Earthling primitives...
to mere wooden dolls![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0004
rows.name:
As the ancient saying goes,
"there is no defense against superior numbers."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0005
rows.name:
We are here entrusted with
the future of all Earth's humanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0006
rows.name: That will to live will not yield to anyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0006_2
rows.name: Luxaar, you lost to that will.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0007
rows.name: At least... just one more glimpse... of the Great One[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0008
rows.name: Did we win[ST:wide ]—?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0009
rows.name: Looks like it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0010
rows.name: We did it, Lieutenant![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Lin-san, it's party time-meh!
You have to treat us-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0012
rows.name: That's right, a grand one![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0013
rows.name: This is exactly what the ancient saying calls "dancing with wild joy"![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_JNK0010
rows.name: Delight

rows.label: xs12080100_SEL0011
rows.name: Raise your fist in joy.

rows.label: xs12080100_JNK0020
rows.name: Calm

rows.label: xs12080100_SEL0021
rows.name:
Prompt the continuation
of the talk from before the battle.

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0014
rows.name:
You did it.
It's thanks to you and Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0015
rows.name: I'm grateful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Elma-san, that's mean-meh!
Tatsu worked hard too-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0017
rows.name:
That's right.
Thank you, Tatsu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0018
rows.name: No thanks needed-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0019
rows.name: Good grief, Tatsu... always getting carried away until the very end.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0020
rows.name: By the way, Colonel Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0021
rows.name: About what you said earlier... what did you mean by "the facts are different"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0022
rows.name: Right, I'll explain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0023
rows.name:
Let's rejoice a little bit!
We defeated the Growth's Grandmaster![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0024
rows.name:
Tatsu was so happy he even said to use himself
as an ingredient for the party![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0025
rows.name:
Li-Li-Li-Lin-san!
Tatsu didn't say such a thing-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0026
rows.name: Eh? Earlier you said "I'll treat you" and...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0027
rows.name: Th-That's wrong-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0028
rows.name:
I said it, but that's wrong-meh!
I didn't mean it like that-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0029
rows.name: Sorrry~ I made a mistake![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0030
rows.name:
It was on purpose-meh!
It was definitely on purpose-meh~~![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0031
rows.name: Decide on the ingredient matter between the two of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0032
rows.name: Now, I must continue the story from earlier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0033
rows.name: Do you know what that thing above is?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0034
rows.name:
It looks like a 7th generation optical quantum computer.
But such a gigantic one...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0035
rows.name: It is as Lin says.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0036
rows.name:
That is a computer with the greatest processing
power and largest memory capacity created by Earth's humanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0037
rows.name:
That is the very core of the Earth Life Colonization Project.
Your consciousnesses are being transferred from there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0038
rows.name: Eh!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0039
rows.name: Elma-san, does that mean[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0040
rows.name:
It means literally what I said.
Not just you all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0041
rows.name:
The consciousnesses of the 20 million Earthlings
who escaped Earth via the Earth Life Colonization Project...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0042
rows.name:
In other words, the memory data and the genetic
information that constituted each individual body...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0043
rows.name: Are all digitized and preserved as cloud data.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0044
rows.name: Then... our bodies are[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0045
rows.name: The originals after sampling consciousness and genes are[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0046
rows.name: They perished along with the Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0053
rows.name: Then... does that mean we are already dead?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0054
rows.name: You could say that, and you could say otherwise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0055
rows.name:
Certainly, the bodies you were born with
perished along with the consciousness housed within them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0056
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0057
rows.name:
But from the moment the Earth Life
Colonization Project sampled you[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0058
rows.name: Your hearts, which became cloud data, continue to live.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0059
rows.name:
Eventually, your bodies will also
be regenerated by the Life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0060
rows.name: Our bodies too!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0061
rows.name: Watch[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0062
rows.name:
Into each one of those microtubules,
genetic information of all Earth's biological species is incorporated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0063
rows.name: The true form of the Earth Life Colonization Project[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0064
rows.name:
Was an ark itself, to bequeath the genetic information
of organisms that existed on Earth to future generations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0065
rows.name: Ark... you mean that one from the Old Testament?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0066
rows.name: Yes, this is Noah's Ark[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0067
rows.name: Humanity's last hope, prepared for resurrection on the day to come.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0068
rows.name: What fills the space under this floor is protoplasmic solution.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0069
rows.name: From the preserved genetic information, biological bodies can be regenerated like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0070
rows.name: Then, humans too[ST:wide ]— us too?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0071
rows.name: Current memory data can be transferred into the cultured bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0072
rows.name:
Your consciousness, currently active in [System:Ruby rt=B.B.s ]Blue Bloods[/System:Ruby],
should be able to move while maintaining continuity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0073
rows.name: Then... that means we can return to flesh-and-blood bodies![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0074
rows.name: Is that okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0075
rows.name: The body you were with for decades since birth died...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0076
rows.name: And you're reborn into a brand new body with no scars...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0077
rows.name: Is that okay? Can you even say you survived with that!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0078
rows.name: Transferring memories, you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0079
rows.name: Then, what becomes of my existence here right now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0080
rows.name: Is the me who returns to flesh and blood really the current me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0081
rows.name:
Strictly speaking, the self of today and
the self of tomorrow are different.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0082
rows.name: Speaking on a cellular level, one could say they are different people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0083
rows.name: We only recognize ourselves as individuals because there is continuity of consciousness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0084
rows.name: Everything is a fleeting illusion[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0085
rows.name:
As long as the existence of the soul cannot be proven,
it will never leave the realm of philosophical questions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0086
rows.name: Doug's doubts are reasonable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0087
rows.name:
Even within the Earth Life Colonization Project,
that issue was debated for a long time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0088
rows.name: Then[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0089
rows.name: There was certainly a plan to migrate people from Earth via cold sleep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0090
rows.name:
It seems there were immigrant ship projects that actually executed that.
But those ships could only accommodate tens of thousands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0091
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0092
rows.name: In the Earth Life Colonization Project[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0093
rows.name:
A single immigrant ship could load data for 20 million people
and enough equipment to regenerate that many bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0094
rows.name:
The upper echelons chose this option after considering
the sinfulness and dangers of the plan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0095
rows.name: I was asked for my opinion, and I agreed too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0096
rows.name: Then, when Lao-san said Earth's humanity died back there...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0097
rows.name: He must have known.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0098
rows.name: That is precisely why, even if it was 20 million people...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0099
rows.name:
I think he couldn't forgive that some humans
were attempting to prolong their lives in this way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0100
rows.name: I understand that feeling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0101
rows.name: But you know, he didn't expose the truth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0102
rows.name: That was probably[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0103
rows.name: Lin, I think he didn't want you to hear it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0104
rows.name: And he opened the path to this place for us. That is his true feeling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0105
rows.name: That is what I think.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0106
rows.name: Yes[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0107
rows.name:
The Earth Life Colonization Project was programmed so that the [System:Ruby rt=B.B.s ]Blue Bloods[/System:Ruby]
protect this system and migrate to a new land[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0108
rows.name:
And after constructing the social infrastructure to live there,
the people would be regenerated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0109
rows.name:
Although obstructers called the Growth appeared,
the program is reaching its final stage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0110
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0111
rows.name:
Doug, I want to make the Earth Life Colonization Project succeed.
Even if there are people who consider it a false life, it doesn't matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0112
rows.name: I will do what I must do. That is my choice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0113
rows.name: What about you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0114
rows.name: ...Sorry, Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0115
rows.name:
I might have let the blood rush to my head.
There are still parts I can't accept, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0116
rows.name: I admire the enthusiasm of the guys who executed a plan of this scale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0117
rows.name: Since I was given this body, I want to carry on that sentiment too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0118
rows.name: Doug... me too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0119
rows.name: Tatsu too-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0120
rows.name: But you have nothing to do with this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0121
rows.name: Eh, is that so-meh!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0122
rows.name: The talk was difficult and I didn't understand it well, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0123
rows.name: It's a happy thing that Hom Homs will increase a lot-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0124
rows.name: Hom Hom? What's that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0125
rows.name: Tatsu doesn't really know either-meh![ST:wait ]
